description: Please see attached. Request for Proposal on ERP Programmer Analyst - Level 3. Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR), Regions of Service: National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
# Support for ERP Program Analyst (Level 3) - Industry Canada

**Solicitation Number:** IC204625
**Publication Date:** 2022-08-26
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-09-12 @ 14:00:00 (now expired)
**Trade Agreements:** Competitive under Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Atlantic Procurement Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Description:** Industry Canada is seeking a contract for Support for ERP Program Analyst (Level 3). The successful bidder shall provide support for the implementation, configuration, and testing of the Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system. Please refer to the attached tender documents for further details.

**Regions of Opportunity:**
- National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:**
Industry Canada

**Contact Information:**
Gagne, Heidi
Email: heidi.gagne@ised-isde.gc.ca
Phone: 343-542-9135

**Tender Documents:**
A supporting document is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/4637b75792a8e261fa30c675d76dd192/npp_ic204625.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/4637b75792a8e261fa30c675d76dd192/npp_ic204625.pdf) - English (npp\_ic204625.pdf)
A supporting document is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/3be468a6b16f40a1bb746ac88aa6e8ff/apm\_ic204625.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/3be468a6b16f40a1bb746ac88aa6e8ff/apm\_ic204625.pdf) - French (apm\_ic204625.pdf)

Remaining Words: 337/400
